backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing user profiles, photos, and albums with access control, blob storage, and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented album features to files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to short summaries describing each component or screen.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, dark mode, and base typography.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up root element and loading the main React script.
frontend/PHOTO_APP_STAGE_2_ALBUMS.checkp: Checkpoint document outlining completed album features, UI flow, and backend integration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile setup, and rendering HomeScreen.
frontend/src/components/AlbumActionsDial: Dialog component for creating, renaming, and deleting albums with async mutations.
frontend/src/components/AlbumCard.tsx: Album card showing cover image, name, and photo count, using first photo as the cover.
frontend/src/components/AlbumPhotoGridIt: Renders a square photo thumbnail with hover-based remove button and click handling.
frontend/src/components/PendingUploadPre: Displays pending image uploads with previews and controls to remove individual or all files.
frontend/src/components/PhotoGrid.tsx: Shows a responsive grid of photos where each item triggers a click callback with its index.
frontend/src/components/PhotoPickerDialo: Modal for selecting photos from a paginated list to add to an album, with selection state and add action.
frontend/src/components/PhotoViewer.tsx: Full-screen photo viewer supporting navigation, keyboard controls, and photo deletion.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting the user to enter and save their name via a profile save mutation.
frontend/src/components/UploadButton.tsx: Handles selecting image files, generating previews, tracking upload progress, and uploading photos.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on authentication state, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login state and persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, photos, and album data through a backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables for light and dark modes and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that sets up React, React Query, and the Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/screens/AlbumDetailScreen.t: Displays album details with photo grid, photo viewer, and actions for adding, removing, or modifying photos and album metadata.
frontend/src/screens/AlbumsScreen.tsx: Shows the list of albums with loading states, creation dialog, and navigation into album detail views.
frontend/src/screens/HomeScreen.tsx: Main screen with tabs for photo library and albums, handling photo viewing, uploads, user info, and sign‑out.
frontend/src/screens/SignInScreen.tsx: Simple sign‑in screen that triggers Internet Identity login with loading feedback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning hash parameters for routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: JSON record of the project’s current state, requirements, features, and architectural notes for a photo library app.
